title: What are the benefits of Plus membership?
answer: Plus members can enjoy savings of upto 15% on booking amount, with a max discount of ₹100 per request. The fee for repairs will be charged as per actuals.

title: How does 100% money back guarantee work?
answer: If a subscriber saves less than the membership price at the end of the membership period, he/she will automatically get a refund worth membership price - total discount availed as UC cash. UC cash can be used while booking any service across any category.

title: Is there a limit to maximum discount per transaction?
answer: Yes, maximum discount per transaction is limited to ₹100

title: Is there a limit to number of transactions under the membership?
answer: No, there’s no limit on number of transactions under the membership. But as per our fair usage policy, the total discount you can avail is limited to 6 times the membership price.

title: Is there a limit to the total maximum discount I can avail?
answer: Yes, as per our fair usage policy, the total discount you can avail is limited to 6 times the membership price you paid

title: Who is a UC Plus professional?
answer: UC Plus professionals are a curated set of professionals who are top-rated, specially trained, and experts in their field.

title: Can I pay for membership through cash?
answer: Membership can only be bought by paying online. For all the subsequent bookings, you have the option of paying in cash or online

title: Can I cancel the membership after buying it or transfer it?
answer: No, the membership cannot be cancelled or transferred

title: Can I get Plus discount on extra services taken after the professional reaches my place?
answer: No. Membership discount is applicable only on services booked via UC app and not on any extra services taken directly from the professional.
